location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Captain Robert Taylor, Political Agent, Bussorah [Basra]

mods.abstract: Informing him that as a result of ill health Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus had been forced to proceed from Muscat to Bombay, and that he (Riach) was carrying out the duties of the Residency until further orders.
